title: Remove all authentication and caller checks to enable full guest access

requirements.summary: Remove any remaining authentication-related logic from frontend hooks (useActor.ts) that calls initAccessControl or depends on authentication state for authorization
acceptanceCriteria: useActor.ts does not call initAccessControl when actor is ready
Frontend does not attempt to initialize or manage access control
All backend operations work without any authentication setup

file_operations.description: Remove the initializeAccessControl call that occurs when the actor becomes ready. Currently the hook calls actor.initializeAccessControl() after the actor is created; this must be removed so that no access control initialization happens. The hook should still create and manage the actor instance, but without any authentication or authorization setup calls.
